item.title: Welcome!
item.author: cx510@proton.me (Charanpreet Singh)
item.description: Hi, there! Welcome to my CV page. This was created for showcasing my resume on a static page with no JS for safety purpose. You can disable JS using uBlock and access it without any scripts. Thank you for checking it! You can save it by using cmd + s key. For downloading a PDF version of my CV click here. I might add blogs later down the line, if i get time!
item.content:encoded:
Hi, there!

Welcome to my CV page. This was created for showcasing my resume on a static page with no JS for safety purpose. You can disable JS using uBlock and access it without any scripts. Thank you for checking it!

You can save it by using cmd + s key. For downloading a PDF version of my CV click here.

I might add blogs later down the line, if i get time!

Credits to Shaolong Chen for creating this theme for personal use!
